definition: having unsuitable feminine qualities, remove the testicles of a male animal
details:
adjective
- having unsuitable feminine qualities
= synonyms: epicene, cissy, sissified, sissyish, sissy, effeminate
verb
- remove the testicles of a male animal
= synonyms: castrate, demasculinize, demasculinise
- deprive of strength or vigor
= example: deprive of strength or vigor
= synonyms: castrate
